scripts.build: rimraf public && npm run -s og-image && npm run -s deck
scripts.deck: marp --html --allow-local-files --no-stdin presentation.md -o public/index.html && ncp assets public/assets
scripts.vercel-build: npm i puppeteer && MARP_USER=root CHROME_PATH=$(node -e "console.log(require('puppeteer').executablePath())") npm run build
